nodes.text: A bodyguard worked for the Black Sun Vigo Nep Chung. Like this employer, the bodyguard was a Phuii. The bodyguard was killed by the Sith Lord Darth Maul during his attack on the Black Sun leadership on Ralltiir.
In Darth Maul 3, Nep Chung is a yellow-skinned Phuii, while his bodyguard is yellow. However, in Darth Maul 4, both Phuii are yellow.
